original_text:
“You daughters of Israel, weep over Saul,
    who clothed you luxuriously in scarlet,
    who put ornaments of gold on your apparel.
korean_text: 이스라엘 딸들아 사울을 슬퍼하여 울지어다 그가 붉은 옷으로 너희에게 화려하게 입혔고 금 노리개를 너희 옷에 채웠도다

sentences.original_text: who clothed you luxuriously in scarlet,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희를 진홍색 옷으로 화려하게 입혔으니,

sentences.original_text: who put ornaments of gold on your apparel.
